attributes.action: Government advisors should be held accountable for their actions to parliament.
attributes.additional_details: Seriously? After todays performance by the Prime Minister
attributes.background: If we are “all in this together” we are all in this together. No exceptions, especially for those who appear to have undue influence on the cabinet and prime ministers office. This entire practice should stop

rejection.details:
We understand that you are concerned that Government advisors are not accountable to Parliament for their actions, but it's not clear what action you want the Government or House of Commons to take to change this.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Make appointments of special advisers subject to parliamentary approval: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/323054
